statements: SELECT * FROM UserEngagementPatterns WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT engagement_date, user_id, engagement_type FROM UserEngagementPatterns WHERE media_content_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, engagement_type FROM UserEngagementPatterns WHERE engagement_type = 'like' ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM UserEngagementPatterns WHERE media_content_id IN (3, 7);
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_engagements FROM UserEngagementPatterns WHERE engagement_type = 'comment';
SELECT * FROM UserEngagementPatterns WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, engagement_date, media_content_id FROM UserEngagementPatterns WHERE engagement_type = 'like';
SELECT user_id, media_content_id FROM UserEngagementPatterns WHERE user_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT MAX(engagement_date), MIN(engagement_date) FROM UserEngagementPatterns WHERE media_content_id = 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_engagements FROM UserEngagementPatterns GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_engagements > 3;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT engagement_type, engagement_timestamp FROM user_engagement WHERE media_id = 5 ORDER BY engagement_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT media_id, engagement_type FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'like';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_engagements FROM user_engagement GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM targeted_marketing WHERE marketing_strategy LIKE '%social%' ORDER BY ad_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement WHERE user_id = 100
SELECT DISTINCT media_id, engagement_timestamp FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'like' ORDER BY engagement_timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, media_id, engagement_type FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY media_id, engagement_timestamp

SELECT user_id, media_id, engagement_type FROM user_engagement JOIN targeted_marketing ON user_engagement.media_id = targeted_marketing.media_id WHERE target_audience = 'young adults' ORDER BY user_id DESC

SELECT user_engagement.user_id, user_engagement.media_id, targeted_marketing.target_audience, targeted_marketing.marketing_strategy FROM user_engagement JOIN targeted_marketing ON user_engagement.media_id = targeted_marketing.media_id WHERE engagement_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY engagement_timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM user_engagement;
SELECT user_id, engagement_type FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'like';
SELECT content_name, content_rating FROM media_content ORDER BY content_rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, content_id, interaction_timestamp FROM user_media_interactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT AVG(content_rating) as average_rating FROM media_content;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_type='click' ORDER BY engagement_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, engagement_type FROM user_engagement WHERE user_id=1 AND engagement_type='view' ORDER BY engagement_timestamp ASC;
SELECT content_name, content_type, content_rating FROM media_content WHERE content_type='video' ORDER BY content_rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, content_id FROM user_media_interactions WHERE interaction_type='like' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC LIMIT 20;

SELECT * FROM user_engagement JOIN user_media_interactions ON user_engagement.user_id = user_media_interactions.user_id WHERE user_engagement.engagement_type='click' AND user_media_interactions.interaction_type='like' ORDER BY user_engagement.engagement_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement;
SELECT user_id, content_id, engagement_type FROM user_engagement WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT content_id, engagement_time FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'like';
SELECT user_id, age, gender, location FROM user_demographics WHERE gender = 'male';
SELECT content_id, content_type, genre FROM content_data ORDER BY release_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT content_id, engagement_type FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, content_id, engagement_type FROM user_engagement ORDER BY engagement_time DESC;
SELECT ud.user_id, ud.age, cd.genre FROM user_demographics ud JOIN content_data cd ON ud.user_id = 2 AND ud.user_id = cd.content_id;
SELECT us.strategy_name, us.target_group, ms.budget FROM marketing_strategies us JOIN marketing_strategies ms ON us.strategy_name = ms.strategy_name AND us.strategy_name LIKE 'Ad%';
SELECT user_id, engagement_type, engagement_time FROM user_engagement ORDER BY engagement_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT media_title, genre FROM media_content WHERE release_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE preferred_language = 'English' AND subscription_status = true;
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience, engagement_type FROM marketing_strategies WHERE platform = 'Social Media';
SELECT campaign_id, success_rate, cost_per_click FROM campaign_results WHERE success_rate > 0.8 ORDER BY cost_per_click ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT media_title, release_date FROM media_content WHERE genre = 'Action' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, preferred_genre, preferred_language FROM user_preferences WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience, platform FROM marketing_strategies WHERE engagement_type = 'Social Media';
SELECT campaign_id, success_rate, cost_per_click FROM campaign_results WHERE success_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY cost_per_click ASC;
